Sigmoid

Sigmoid

#all/deeplearning/activationFunctions

The sigmoid function can be defined as:

f(x) = 1 / (1 + e^(-x))

Where:

  • f(x) is the output of the sigmoid function for input x
  • e is the Euler’s number (approximately 2.71828)
